GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an individual article object based on the user specified ID

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an an array of comments based on the user specified article ID
